quotes.message: Deal with the faults of others as gently as your own.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Justice is truth in action.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: A new broom sweeps clean but an old broom knows the corners.
quotes.name: Virgin Islander

quotes.message: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and he'll eat forever.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Silence is often misinterpreted but never misquoted.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Lost time is never found again.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The wise understand by themselves; fools follow the reports of others.
quotes.name: Tibetan

quotes.message: When our imperfect judgments are aggregated in the right way, our collective intelligence is often excellent.
quotes.name: James Surowiecki

quotes.message: The goal of human nature, of any nature is blessedness. If we do not reach this goal, it is a sign that we are headed in the wrong direction.
quotes.name: Raimon Pannikar

quotes.message: To know how to grow old is the master work of wisdom, and one of the most difficult chapters in the great art of living.
quotes.name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.message: One should speak little with others and much with oneself.
quotes.name: Danish

quotes.message: When you say one thing, the clever person understands three.
quotes.name: Chinese

quotes.message: The riches that are in the heart cannot be stolen.
quotes.name: Russian Proverb

quotes.message: The only thing we can know is that we know nothing and that is the highest flight of human wisdom.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: The young man knows the rules, but the old man knows the exceptions.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.message: Plan your life like you will live forever, and live your life like you will die the next day.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Proverbs are short sentences drawn from long experience.
quotes.name: Cervantes

quotes.message: Desires are brought to live depending on one’s wisdom. Wisdom gives direction to desires.
quotes.name: Takuan Soho

quotes.message: Wisdom is ofttimes nearer when we stoop than when we soar.
quotes.name: William Wordsworth

quotes.message: A proverb is one man's wit and all men's wisdom.
quotes.name: Lord John Russell

quotes.message: A blind person who sees is better than a seeing person who is blind.
quotes.name: Iranian

quotes.message: A proverb is a short sentence based on long experience.
quotes.name: American

quotes.message: Economy is the wealth of the poor and the wisdom of the rich.
quotes.name: French

quotes.message: Even a fish wouldn't get into trouble if it kept its mouth shut.
quotes.name: Korean

quotes.message: He that respects himself is safe from others.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: He who flees at the right time can fight again.
quotes.name: Marcus Trentius Varro

quotes.message: A crown's no cure for a headache.
quotes.name: English

quotes.message: Life is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: In bad things be slow; in good things be fast.
quotes.name: Afghan

quotes.message: Just because something is common sense doesn't mean it's common practice.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Nothing is impossible to the willing mind.
quotes.name: Books of the Han Dynasty

quotes.message: One head cannot hold all wisdom.
quotes.name: Maasai

quotes.message: Plan your life at New Year's, your day at dawn.
quotes.name: Japanese

quotes.message: Proverbs are the daughters of experience.
quotes.name: Sierra Leone

quotes.message: Wisdom is to live in the present, plan for the future and profit from the past.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The errors of a wise man make your rule rather than the perfections of a fool.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: The more things change, the more they stay the same.
quotes.name: Alphonse Karr

quotes.message: The truly rich are those who enjoy what they have.
quotes.name: Yiddish

quotes.message: The wise do as much as they should, not as much as they can.
quotes.name: French

quotes.message: What's good for the goose is good for the gander.
quotes.name: John Ray

quotes.message: Wisdom is easy to carry but difficult to gather.
quotes.name: Czech

quotes.message: Wonder is the beginning of wisdom,
quotes.name: Greek Proverb

quotes.message: Wisdom has always been the wealth of the common people.
quotes.name: Raimon Pannikar

quotes.message: Health is better than wealth.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You can never plan the future by the past.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: You can lead a horse to water but you can't make him drink.
quotes.name: John Heywood

quotes.message: Live and let live.
quotes.name: Dutch Proverb

quotes.message: You have to take the bitter with the sweet.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Everything in moderation.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Life is what you make it.
quotes.name: Grandma Moses

quotes.message: All's well that ends well.
quotes.name: John Heywood

quotes.message: Out of sight, out of mind.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You can only die once.
quotes.name: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.message: Knowledge comes but wisdom lingers.
quotes.name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.message: It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to speak and remove all doubt
quotes.name: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.message: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to reform (or pause and reflect).
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.name: Anthony Douglas Williams

quotes.message: The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: The older you get, the more quiet you become. Life humbles you so deeply as you age. You realize how much nonsense you’ve waste time on.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Never, no, never did nature say one thing and wisdom say another.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: Knowledge is knowing what to say. Wisdom is knowing when to say it.
quotes.name: Colette

quotes.message: The invariable mark of wisdom is to see the miraculous in the common.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Seek the wisdom of the ages, but look at the world through the eyes of a child.
quotes.name: Debbie Ford

quotes.message: It is the province of knowledge to speak, and it is the privilege of wisdom to listen.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Wisdom is the daughter of experience.
quotes.name: Edward Hersey Richards

quotes.message: It is said that wisdom lies not in seeing things, but seeing through things.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Knowledge is learning something every day. Wisdom is letting go of something every day.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.
quotes.name: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.message: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: The wise man hath his thoughts in his head; the fool, on his tongue.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Wisdom is not wisdom when it is derived from books alone.
quotes.name: Holly Near

quotes.message: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Wisdom is knowing the right path to take. Integrity is taking it.
quotes.name: Immanuel Kant

quotes.message: Wisdom is the supreme part of happiness.
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: It is characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things.
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.name: Ivan Panin

quotes.message: Any fool can know. The point is to understand.
quotes.name: Jess C. Scott

quotes.message: The best index to a person's character is how he treats people who can't do him any good, and how he treats people who can't fight back.
quotes.name: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.message: Think before you speak. Read before you think.
quotes.name: Langston Hughes

quotes.message: Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what's right.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: The simple things are also the most extraordinary things, and only the wise can see them.
quotes.name: M. H. McKee

quotes.message: By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: You do not write your life with words...You write it with actions. What you think is not important. It is only important what you do.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: Let no man pull you so low as to hate him.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.message: God will not look you over for medals, degrees or diplomas but for scars.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes.name: Patrick Ness

quotes.message: The knight of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends.
quotes.name: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.message: You will do foolish things, but do them with enthusiasm.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Follow your heart, listen to your inner voice, stop caring about what others think.
quotes.name: Proverbs

quotes.message: Failure is the condiment which gives success its flavor.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Don't waste your time with explanations: people only hear what they want to hear.
quotes.name: Ron Wild

quotes.message: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: Hold fast to dreams for if dreams die life is a broken-winged bird, that cannot fly.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Faith gives us strength and reassurance and leaves us bathed in the wisdom that we are never alone.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Faith gives us strength and reassurance and leaves us bathed in the wisdom that we are never alone.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.name: St. Augustine

quotes.message: Let your actions demonstrate your wisdom.
quotes.name: Truman Capote

quotes.message: Wisdom is more precious than jewels, nothing else is so worthy of desire.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Knowledge comes from learning. Wisdom comes from living.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If you have the guts to keep making mistakes, your wisdom and intelligence leap forward with huge momentum.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: A wise owl sat on an oak, the more he saw the less he spoke, the less he spoke the more he heard.
quotes.name: Zen Proverb
